a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}a-ši-pa-a lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia a-dan-niš DI-mu a-na {URU}bi-rat a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-ia UN-MEŠ an-nu-te {URU}a-ba-a.a ur-ki-u₂-te ša u₂-ma-a u₂-še-ṣu-u-ni a-na-ku o x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ na-ši e-x x pa-an {MI₂}ha-ri-ma-te o is-se-niš ur-ta-me o x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ {LU₂}da-a.a-li o a-na ma-ṣar-te ša ne₂-ri-bi {URU}a-ba-a ša ina re-šu-šu-nu x x x x URU ina GIR₃.2 x x x x x x+x+x x x x x
